text: Malipilo gao kwa Ambuje ŵao chigakaŵe Matimbe Gandamo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo. Chakaŵe ŵandamo mwalakwemo kwa yaka ni yaka. Allah tachanonyela (pakwapochela masengo gao gambone), nombe nao tachinonyelwa Najo (pamalipilo gataachaapa). Yalakweyo ni yamundu jwatan'jogope M'mbujeegwe (Allah)
